name: Descend and Explore
description:
Your teammates are your most powerful asset as you lead your ship's landing party through strange planets. Issue commands to your teammates and get these planets sorted out.

We made this for Sophie Houlden's Star Trek Jam because trying to make a third-person action game with an emphasis on meaningful computer controlled ally interactions in one month seemed like a good idea at the time.

It's best with a gamepad but keyboard and mouse should work.

Controls: A - Interact, R - Fire, L - Command, X - Recon, L Stick - Move, R Stick - Look.

The Mac and Linux builds haven't been tested so if you give them a go know that you are a daring trailblazer exploring uncharted worlds.

-Tad Patterson & Matthew Patterson
